# v2025.12.24 - Christmas Edition ðŸŽ„

Welcome to the GNOME MAUI .NET Christmas edition!

This release marks the first public snapshot of the GNOME MAUI .NET project:
a working `net10.0-gnome` TFM, a functional `maui-gnome` workload, and runnable MAUI
and MAUI Blazor sample applications on GNOME.

Included CPU and GPU accelerated rendering backends using GTK4 and SkiaSharp (OpenGL).

For details, documentation, and setup instructions, see the project README.
